column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////They have a private parking lot but since they are getting so much well deserved love
column2: the place can be crazy.  You're better off looking for street parking
column4: some areas are permit parking only.  On this particular visit we kind of parked in an area where we needed to get back to our cars asap
column5: so we took our order to-go.  But the dining space is beautiful.  Very modern and busy.
